articles.title: No merger of AirAsia's aviation business - Tony Fernandes - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: There will be no merger of AirAsia’s aviation arm businesses into one new entity, instead all aviation operations will be injected under one existing structure, said Capital A Bhd chief executive officer Tan Sri Tony Fernandes.
